sentences.sentence: He had a stalwart figure and walked with an air.
sentences.translation: 他身材魁梧，走起路来很有气派。

sentences.sentence: This heavenly scented stalwart is one of the easiest lilies to grow.
sentences.translation: 这品散发着天香的坚强品种是最容易种植的百合之一。

sentences.sentence: On UNIX systems, the stalwart utility tar makes light work of building archives.
sentences.translation: 在UNIX系统中，可靠的实用程序tar可以用来简化构建存档的工作。
